title: (x) Titling font in Godard's Masculin Feminin - (similar to) Neuzeit Grotesk {Erik S}
content:
Hi, this is my first post although I've been a regular visitor for a while.  
Well, anyways, does anyone know which font this is, or has a suggestion of one that closely resembles it.

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110519105148im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Godard_font_4970.jpg)
author: dolemite

comments.content: Ah, didn't see it was posted before. Thanks
